name: vera.vim
description: Updated syntax file for Vera 2005.06. Many new features are added from previous vera syntax versions.
install_details:
drop it in ~/.vim/syntax/vera.vim.

NOTE: extra white space at the end of the line will be highlighted if you add this line to your colorscheme:

highlight SpaceError    guibg=#204050

(change the value for guibg to any color you like)
